name: Chiral Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz P4, Dual Core 2.0 (or higher) or AMD64X2 (or higher)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card must be 128 MB or more and with support for Pixel Shader 2.0b (ATI Radeon X800 or higher / NVIDIA GeForce 7600 or higher / Intel HD Graphics 2000 or higher).

short_description: Chiral is a sci-fi dark-comedy 3D puzzle game where you assume the role of a disembodied brain in a jar, paired with a digital AI companion. Together, you will navigate a labyrinth of mirror, laser, and gravity puzzles that will challenge your spatial reasoning.
